entry.title: Re Enables control of your phone or computer, and through them almost any device, just by thinking. Initial users will be those who have lost the use ...
entry.summary: Re Enables control of your phone or computer, and through them almost any device, just by thinking. Initial users will be those who have lost the use of their limbs. Imagine if Stephen Hawking could communicate faster than a speed typist or auctioneer. That is the goal.
